message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $9,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,000 and $10,500. How about $9,750?
